content: परितस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (Usually with a noun in the <ab>acc.</ab>, sometimes by itself) {@--1@} All around, on all sides, round about, in all directions, everywhere, on every side; रक्षांसि वेदीं परितो निरास्थत् <ls>Bk. 1. 12</ls>; <ls>Śi. 5. 26</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">9. 36</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4. 7</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">3. 27</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 14</ls>; गाहितमखिलं गहनं परितो दृष्टाश्च विटपिनः सर्वे <ls>Bv. 1. 21</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">29.</ls> {@--2@} Towards, in the direction of; आपेदिरेंऽबरपथं परितः पतंगाः <ls>Bv. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 66.</ls>
